title: Law lets state workers use Uber and Airbnb for business travel - Los Angeles Times
text: Law lets state workers use Uber and Airbnb for business travel Los Angeles Times An Uber driver drops off a passenger at Los Angeles International Airport. A new law ensures that state workers are reimbursed for using Uber and other sharing-economy businesses for business travel.
